Description: You are given gifts now|you happy?|Dont cry when its not what you want
Rules Description: Items are randomised each turn|using special [quote]themecards[quote]
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:A Shield~[;]~Equipment:A Tool~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:A Merry Christmas~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~christmasspecial/setepisodenum~[;][1]); Rules.excludeenemies([~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Lumberjack~[;]~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Copycat~[;]~Grinch~]); Rules.rulescreen(~warriorrules~)

Description: Sales Sales Sales! With the arrival of Christmas more shops|are opening up. All the monsters are trampling around|the shops in search of gifts. It's so bad that you won't get any.
Rules Description: Enemies leave [gold]2 gold after defeating them.|Shops are more common.|Make twice as many gadgets.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Creative Crisis~[;]~Equipment:Consumerism~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]rand([~Equipment:Iced Latte~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Kettle~])[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~christmasspecial/setepisodenum~[;][1]); /*Rules.mixedupshops(); */ Rules.inventor_setgadgets(2); Rules.excludeenemies([~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Lumberjack~[;]~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Nicholas~]); Rules.rulescreen(~inventorrules~);

Description: It's time to collect all your spells and powers[;]|because you need thrice as more spells and powers!|Shame it's only you alone[;] Witch.
Rules Description: You can use 3 spellbooks.|Start with 4 dice and without prepared spell slot..
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Flaming Sword~[;]~Spell:Buzzing Sword~[;] ~Spell:Frozen Sword~[;] ~Spell:Echo Sword~][;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~Spell:Mirror Cauldron~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~ExtraDice:-650~[;] ~WitchUpgrade~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Lunasa~[;]  ~Spell:Diary Burning~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Shadow Clone~[;] ~WitchUpgrade~]);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~christmasspecial/setepisodenum~[;][1]); Spellbook.showspellbookinstructions = false; Spellbook.setto([Spellbook.spellname(1)[;]Spellbook.spellname(2)][;][][;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot1~[;]~Cauldron~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot2~[;]~Infliction~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot3~[;]~Magic Shield~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot4~[;]~Magic Missile~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot5~[;]~Duplicate~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot6~[;]~Hall of Mirrors~); self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]1); Rules.witch_randomspellslot[3] = [~Next Tome~]; Rules.rulescreen(~externalwitchingrules~); self.setvar(~spellbook1unavailable~[;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook2unavailable~[;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook3unavailable~[;]0); Rules.excludeenemies([~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Loud Bird~[;]~Bounty Hunter~]);
Script: End Turn: if(target.hp > 0){ var booknum = self.getvar(~currentspellbook~); for(i in 1...7) { if(Spellbook.isempty(i)) { self.setvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+i[;]~Empty slot~); } else { self.setvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+i[;]Spellbook.spellname(i)); } }self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]self.getvar(~currentspellbook~) + 1); if(self.getvar(~currentspellbook~) == 4) { self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]1); } booknum = self.getvar(~currentspellbook~); for(q in 1...7) { if(self.getvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+q) != ~Empty slot~) { Spellbook.changespellflash(q[;]self.getvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+q)); } else { Spellbook.erase(q); } } }

Description: As a special gift[;] Lady Luck[]'s letting you|abandon your Deck and use equipment normally!|...Semi-normally. She may have a grudge.
Rules Description: You no longer use a deck|You start with 3 dice.|Only one card is available at a time
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shiny Sword~[;]~Equipment:Chaingun~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~[;] [~Equipment:Chainbump~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~christmasspecial/setepisodenum~[;][1]); Rules.excludeenemies([~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Lumberjack~[;]~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Drain Monster~[;]~Gardener~[;]~Stereohead~[;]~Sorceress~[;]~Singer~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Kraken~[;]~Skeleton~[;]~Banshee~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Bounty Hunter~]); Rules.enemyhpadjust = 1.1; Rules.rulescreen(~jesterrules~);

Description: Fight a random mighty boss |Randomized every time you play
Rules Description: Very strong boss 1 boss 1 robot go at it
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~christmasspecial/setepisodenum~[;][1]); self.level = 6; self.gold = 9; var database = loaddata(~diceydungeons/jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills_rare~); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true; self.roll_target = 14; Rules.rulescreen(~robotrules~);

Description: Now that it's christmas[;] why not|enjoy the festive cheer[;] and|giving back is half of it!
Rules Description: Trade items with the enemy each turn
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Stink Bomb~[;]~Equipment:Greedy Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Come On And Slam~[;] ~Equipment:Buzzsaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~christmasspecial/setepisodenum~[;][1]); Rules.excludeenemies([~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Mimic~[;]~Lumberjack~[;]~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Drake~[;]~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Banshee~[;]~Present~[;]~Aurora~[;]~Nicholas~]); Rules.enemyhpadjust = 1.1; Rules.rulescreen(~thiefrules~);

Description: Revenge is best served cold[;] and now it's Christmas|there's plenty of cold to go around! We hope you|enjoy your trip into the dungeons[;] Lady Luck[] - we|certainly will.
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:The Divine Killer~[;]~Equipment:The Middle Road~[;]~Equipment:The Second Chance~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~christmasspecial/setepisodenum~[;][1]); Rules.rulescreen(~ladyluck~); Rules.excludeenemies([~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Lumberjack~[;]~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Lady Luck[]~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Copycat~[;]~Grinch~]);
Script: Start Combat: var oldeqs = []; var newskills = [~Commandments~]; for (e in self.equipment) if (e.skillcard == ~~) { oldeqs.push(e.name); for (tag in e.tags) if (tag.substr(0[;]6) == ~skill:~) { newskills.push(tag.substr(6)); break; } } self.replaceskillcard(newskills.pop()); self.setvar(~oldeqs~[;]oldeqs); self.setvar(~newskills~[;] newskills)

Description: Rolling negative and above 6?|What manner of witchcraft is this?
Rules Description: Use a new skillcard to roll dice with a chance to error an item|Your only possible rolls are|-6[;]-5[;]-4[;]-3[;]-2[;]-1[;]7[;]8[;]9[;]10[;]11[;]12
Equipment: Can I Haxe You A Question|Pod Shooter|Null Shooter

Rules Description: All your items have dice requirements based on where|you put them in your backpack.

Script: End Turn: for (e in self.equipment) { if (e.skillcard == ~~ && e.timesused == 0 && e.slots.length > 0 && target.hp > 0) { e.totalusesremaining--; } e.timesused = 0; }
Script: Start Combat: Rules.inventor_equipmentrust = 0; self.getskillcard().totalusesremaining = -2; for (e in target.equipment) { e.totalusesremaining = 0; } if(self.varexists(~inventor2_jackpotskills~)) { Rules.jackpotskills = self.getvar(~inventor2_jackpotskills~); trace(~restoring jackpot skills to ~ + Rules.jackpotskills); } runscript(~christmasspecial/inventor/initinventorcalculate~[;][self.roll_target]);
Script: After Combat: Rules.inventor_equipmentrust = 3; for (e in self.getcurrentequipment()) { if (e.totalusesremaining <= -1) { self.equipment.remove(e); e.dispose(); } } self.setvar(~inventor2_jackpotskills~[;] Rules.jackpotskills); runscript(~christmasspecial/inventor/pretendinventorgadgets~);

Script: Before Start Turn: if(self.getvar(~floor~) == 1){ removeequipment(ALL); var eqs = rand(loadtext(~host/copy1~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs); } else if(self.getvar(~floor~) == 2){ removeequipment(ALL); var eqs = rand(loadtext(~host/copy2~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs); }else if(self.getvar(~floor~) == 3){ removeequipment(ALL); var eqs = rand(loadtext(~host/copy3~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs); }else if(self.getvar(~floor~) == 4){ removeequipment(ALL); var eqs = rand(loadtext(~host/copy4~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs); }else if(self.getvar(~floor~) == 5){ removeequipment(ALL); var eqs = rand(loadtext(~host/copy5~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs); } else if(self.getvar(~floor~) == 6){ removeequipment(ALL); var eqs = rand(loadtext(~host/copy6~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs); }
